mapper.select: SELECT a.id AS "id", a.parent_id AS "parentId", a. NAME AS "name", a.auth_url AS "authUrl", a.auth_icon AS "authIcon", a.auth_type AS "authType", a.auth_value AS "authValue", a.mg_type AS "mgType", a.seq AS "seq" FROM sys_auth a UNION ALL SELECT 0, - 1, 'root', '', '', '', '', '', '0' order by seq
mapper.update: DELETE FROM sys_auth where FIND_IN_SET(id, getSysAuthNodeId(#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}))
mapper.select: SELECT b.user_name AS "userName", b. NAME AS "name", c.name AS "status", DATE_FORMAT(a.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %T') AS "createTime", a.remark AS "remark" FROM sys_approval_list a, sys_user b, sys_dic c WHERE 1 = 1 and c.val=a.`status` and c.dic_type='status' AND a.bill_id =#{param.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND a.create_user = b.id ORDER BY create_time DESC
SELECT a.pass_word as "passWord",a.id as "id" FROM sys_user a, sys_org b WHERE a.org_id = b.id and CONCAT(b.flag, '_', a.user_name)=#{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
